title: Sweet mother of Marmaduke!
body:
There's three new phlogs sitting over there! AND the Moxie Shirt Adventures are finally live... look for the big polaroid on the sidebar.

NOTE: The blog is going to try something new tomorrow. Stay tuned.
author: Dan

comments.author: Nicki J
comments.body: dude! the moxie is looking awesome!!

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body: i tried something new once... i didnt throw up.. but i felt very nauseous

comments.author: mike
comments.body:
Hey Dan - do you have a camcorder? It would be cool if you walked around the Moxie and gave a tour on video now that so much is coming together... 

You could even come with a fance new name for them, like... "vilog" (video log), or "molog" (movie log)... hmm - that doesn't roll off the tounge as well as 'phlog' does it? Damn.

comments.author: scott
comments.body: since it would most likely be video presented as streaming media how about smlog?

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: moving picture log = moving photo log = MoFo Log.
